alert.note: Alert for Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:40PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hyde County through 615 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gull Rock, or 27 miles southwest of Stumpy Point, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gull Rock, New Holland, Nebraska and Lake Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
